title: ROS Support (The Robot Operating System)
body: Extend the WSL socket implementation such that ROS can run on WSL.

comments.body: How can we extend this to use the ROS web_video_server package?
A writeup with step by step guide to get started is available here http://janbernloehr.de/2017/06/10/ros-windows

This request was solved in the version of WSL released with the creators update of Windows 10. There is a bug in ROS tough which also needs to be fixed to make ROS fully available on Windows 10. Currently, the fix is only integrated into the develop branch for ROS lunar (https://github.com/ros/ros_comm/pull/1050)
Hello, Could you explain how I could extend the current socket implementation on my system. I am new with ROS?

Hi! Just for other people to be aware of, "ROS" is also the initials of the ReactOS project (that dates back to 1999), an opensource reimplementation of the Windows NT (2k, 2003, etc...) architecture.
